original_text: Then while you are still speaking with the king, I also will come in after you and confirm your words.”
korean_text: 당신이 거기서 왕과 말씀하실 때에 나도 뒤이어 들어가서 당신의 말씀을 확증하리이다

sentences.original_text: Then while you are still speaking with the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 네가 왕과 아직 말하고 있는 동안

sentences.original_text: I also will come in after you
